title: APARTMENTS AVAILABLE TODAY
map_address: 10222 Walton Walker Blvd near Technology blvd
posting_body: Welcome to Budget Suites where you can make one of our apartments your home for a week or beyond!
Budget Suites invites you to relax and unwind in your own personal apartment whether you are relocating to a new city, a business traveler, vacationer, or just making a new start here in Dallas.
Our apartments are spacious, comfortable and equally affordable for any budget.

Our properties are designed to serve you with many amenities including all utilities paid, full sized kitchens and appliances, pools and spas, laundry facilities with courtesy patrol, cable television with premium channels including HBO and ESPN and much more.
Budget Suites has the conveniences of a hotel, with all the comforts of home.
We welcome you to your new home.
At every Budget Suites you will find the same valuable services at a price you can value just as much.
Available upgrades to your apartment include:
Weekly rates start as low as $299.00 (+tax), deposit is required at check-in with first payment.
Move in on the same day!
